    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UserService getInstance()
        getInstance-method. This method is used to create a new RadioProgramService object if it does not exists.

      • retrieveUserList

        public java.util.List<User> retrieveUserList()
        retrieveUserList-method. This will retrieve a list of User object. Please note, that this method will consume huge amounts of resources if table has lot's of rows. This should only be used when target tables have only small amounts of data.

      • paginateUser

        public java.util.List<User> paginateUser(java.lang.Long pageNo,
                                java.lang.Long rowPerPage,
                                User user)
        paginateUser-method. This will get a list of User Object based on the page count and row per page
        Parameters:
        pageNo - Page Number
        rowPerPage - Row number per Page
        user - User Object
        Returns:
        List of User

      • retrieveUser

        public User retrieveUser(java.lang.String username)
        retrieveUser-method. This will get one or zero User object based on passing in username.
        Parameters:
        username - This parameter used for retrieving User Object. It must be individual.
        Returns:
        User Object based on pass-in username

      • saveUser

        public boolean saveUser(User user)
                 throws BusinessLogicException
        saveUser-method. This will save User information to database.
        Parameters:
        roleList -
        User - User Object to be save
        Returns:
        True/False to indicate whether save user is successful.
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • retrievePresenterProducerList

        public java.util.List<User> retrievePresenterProducerList(boolean IsPresenter)
        retrievePresenterProducerList-method. This will retrieve a list of Presenter or Producer Object.
        Parameters:
        IsPresenter - True/False to indicate whether pass-in value is for Presenter or Producer If true means Presenter,otherwise Producer
        Returns:
        List of Presenter or Producer

      • isUserExisting

        isUserExisting-method. This will check whether pass-in User exists
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True/False to indicate whether user exists.
